body.p:
Hugh Gray
Horse Stealing 4 years from Hickman County June term 1857. Recd July 2nd 1857

Says he was drunk and took the horse and Road him but not with the intention of Stealing him. Promises to never be guilty of the like again. and Begs me to get him A Pardon to Restore him. I told him I would lay his case before your Honor

Hickman E. &. C. Ct
"Horse Stealing"
Hugh Gray
4 yrs Penty
Issd. July 1. 1861
